Entries.spring.000: Lots of salad-type dishes in the spring, but I'm not a big fan. I like something a little heartier, you know?#$b#Fortunately, Gus has plenty of other food on the menu.$1
Entries.summer.000: You can always count on the Stardrop Saloon for a good meal. I come here for lunch every day.#$b#You hungry, @? Why don't you pull up a chair and grab a bite?$1
Entries.fall.000: Crisp, cool air, birds singing, the sunlight dappling the grass through the trees... There's nothing like a picnic lunch in the forest.$1
Entries.winter.000: Something about winter makes me want to eat twice as much as normal. Maybe it's just that there's so much good food this time of year.
Entries.rain.000: Hey there, @. I'm just doing a little whittling.#$b#Don't worry, this tree is plenty big enough to keep me dry.$1
Entries.rain.001: Rainy days call for something spicy for lunch. Spicy Eel, or maybe Pepper Poppers...

Entries.Sorren0: Are you excited for the big day? I sure am.$4
Entries.Sorren1: I used to think I would never be happy again. I'm so glad I was wrong, @.$5

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Sorren... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you married!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Sorren... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you married!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if they'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor, on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sorren in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if they'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor, on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sorren in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.SorrenBeach: Dear @,^Would you like to go to the beach with me?^Any nice sunny day should do. Bring your swimsuit!^  -Sorren

Entries.summer_16: Hi, @. I, uh, need some time alone today.$2
The death of a loved one leaves a lifelong scar. But maybe, with time, it can fade a little.$2
